meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects.
meanings.sent1: I found the cyclopaedia very helpful for my research project.
meanings.sent2: The cyclopaedia on my shelf covers topics from A to Z.
meanings.sent3: When I dropped the cyclopaedia, it opened to the page on gravity!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cyclopaedia of random facts and trivia.
meanings.sent5: The cyclopaedia was a treasure trove of knowledge waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing information on all branches of knowledge.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather's cyclopaedia collection fills an entire bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: In the past, a cyclopaedia was a common household reference.
meanings.sent3: The cyclopaedia was so heavy, it felt like carrying a small library.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a cyclopaedia, storing information on everything she read.
meanings.sent5: The cyclopaedia was like a wise old mentor, guiding me through the realms of knowledge.
